title: 31 30 31 "The Mermen""The Worst Man in the Eastern Seas! Fishman Pirate Arlong!"Transliteration: "Higashi no Umi Saiaku no Otoko! Gyojin Kaizoku Āron!" (Japanese:東の海最悪の男!魚人海賊アーロン!) Yuji Endo Michiru Shimada 811.5 July 12, 2000(2000-07-12)[59] April 23, 2005[60]
transformers_text:
31 30 31 "The Mermen""The Worst Man in the Eastern Seas! Fishman Pirate Arlong!"Transliteration: "Higashi no Umi Saiaku no Otoko! Gyojin Kaizoku Āron!" (Japanese:東の海最悪の男!魚人海賊アーロン!) Yuji Endo Michiru Shimada 811.5 July 12, 2000(2000-07-12)[59] April 23, 2005[60]

The crew chases after Nami, who stole their ship, and Yosaku takes time during the trip to explain about Arlong and his Fishmen to Luffy and Sanji. Meanwhile, Usopp, Johnny, and Zoro arrive at the island Nami docked at.
